Desc.entry: Drop-in centre and registered charity providing support to people who have experienced mental health problems who are aged 18 years and over. Provides social and recreational activities including photography, art and crafts, gentle exercise, pool, chess and table tennis. Also has a small amount of computers connected to the internet for members use. Provides free drinks and there are subsidised meals available Monday-Friday with an all you can eat buffet on Wednesdays. GP referral - a letter is needed from your GP saying you suffer from mental illness. Resources include word processing, photocopying, table tennis, pool and chess. Free beverages.
